text: Marie-Hélène Descamps (5 July 1938 – 2 August 2020) was a French politician and Member of the European Parliament for Central France. She was a member of the Union for a Popular Movement, part of the European People's Party. ==References== * Marie-Hélène DESCAMPS. European Parliament. Accessed 2011-01-30. title: Marie-Hélène Descamps
